snippet.title: College Football's Most Expensive Games Of 2013
snippet.description: Texas A&M vs. Alabama was the most anticipated game of 2013, and it showed on the secondary market - the average ticket to the game cost more than $800, the most expensive deal of the regular season.

snippet.title: Top 5 Most Anticipated Video Game Soundtracks of 2013
snippet.description: With 2012 firmly behind us, it's time to look to the future and 2013 is already shaping up to be a promising year for video game soundtracks. Most of the triple-A titles in Q1 and Q2 feature prominent composers meaning 2013 could very well give 2012 a run for its [...] read »

snippet.title: WhatsApp in Asia? WeChat, Line Embrace Ads, Games And Gimmicks
snippet.description: Asia today is a patchwork of mobile, social networking apps, with WeChat, Line and Kakao Talk being the most prominent. The question of ‘WhichApp?’ looms large given Asia’s importance as the world’s largest mobile and online population, and the stakes raised by Facebook with its recent acquisition of WhatsApp. The $19 billion in cash and stock [...] read »

snippet.title: My Take: The Best Video Games of 2013
snippet.description: From tiny works of experimental fiction to $200 million-budget shooters, these are the games that achieved something special.

snippet.title: With An Anticipated $2B IPO And Love From Apple, Digital Health May Finally Get Respect
snippet.description: For the last five year or so, digital health has been the Rodney Dangerfield of investment sectors, getting more attention than respect, and garnering more page views than dollars. However, two important events reported in the last several days suggest all this may be about to change. read »

snippet.title: How Michael Jordan Made $90 Million In 2013
snippet.description: The Jordan Brand is now roughly a $2 billion business for Nike and MJ gets a cut of every shoe, hoodie or pair of shorts sold by the sportswear giant.

snippet.title: Most Anticipated Video Game Soundtracks for April-June 2013
snippet.description: As of now, 2013 has been a pretty good year for soundtracks. DmC: Devil May Cry, Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance, Tomb Raider, Dead Space 3 and Aliens: Colonial Marines all stood out above and beyond and that was only the first quarter of the year. So now that the deluge [...] read »
